title: Some random thoughts
content: My writing is pretty darn clunky. I used to think that reading a lot would make me a smooth, easy writer, but I realized a long time ago that isn't necessarily true. What is it? How can I learn to express myself better? Not better as in I get more of my soul out there, better as in literally easier and more fun to read. It affects me worst when I try to talk about something I like. So I guess, to train, I'll list off and explain my favorite things.
